price: የዚያንም የምናስፈራራቸውን ከፊሉን (በሕይወትህ) ብናሳይህ (መልካም ነው)፡፡ ወይም (ሳናሳይህ) ብንገድልህ መመለሻቸው ወደ እኛ ነው፡፡ ከዚያም አላህ በሚሠሩት ስራ ላይ ዐዋቂ ነው፡፡
arabic: وَإِمَّا نُرِيَنَّكَ بَعۡضَ ٱلَّذِي نَعِدُهُمۡ أَوۡ نَتَوَفَّيَنَّكَ فَإِلَيۡنَا مَرۡجِعُهُمۡ ثُمَّ ٱللَّهُ شَهِيدٌ عَلَىٰ مَا يَفۡعَلُونَ

version.title: Amharic translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Amharic by Muhammad Sadeq and Muhammad Ath-Thany Habib. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wa-immā nuriyannaka baʿḍa alladhī naʿiduhum aw natawaffayannaka fa-ilaynā marjiʿuhum thumma al-lahu shahīdun ʿalā mā yafʿalūna
